mapper.sql: seq, delNy, defaultNy, accountNumber, accountName, accountPassword, accountBalance, member_seq
FROM account WHERE 1=1 AND delNy LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET defaultNy = #{defaultNy}, accountName = #{accountName}, accountPassword = #{accountPassword}, member_seq = #{member_seq} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( delNy, defaultNy, accountNumber, accountName, accountPassword, accountBalance, member_seq ) VALUES ( 0, #{defaultNy}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountName}, #{accountPassword}, #{accountBalance}, #{member_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET delNy = "1" WHERE seq = #{seq}
